name: Seoptimally – Automatic Internal Linking
author: Seoptimally Team

sections.description:
This plugin integrates the Seoptimally JavaScript snippet into all WordPress pages, enhancing SEO through internal linking strategies. It relies on Seoptimally, a third-party service, to optimize website SEO by creating internal links and offering automated link building.
Strategic internal links enhance SEO, leading to better rankings and improved user experience.

Third Party Services

This plugin uses Seoptimally (https://seoptimally.com) for its internal linking capabilities. By using this plugin, you agree to Seoptimally’s Terms of Service (https://seoptimally.com/pages/terms/) and Privacy Policy (https://seoptimally.com/pages/privacy/). Please review their policies to ensure compliance with your website’s legal requirements.
sections.installation:
1. Create an account on Seoptimally’s website.
  2. Add your WordPress site to your Seoptimally account.
  3. Retrieve your Website ID from the Seoptimally integration page.
  4. Install and activate the plugin via the WordPress admin dashboard.
  5. Go to “Settings” > “Seoptimally” and enter your Website ID.
sections.faq:
How does Seoptimally create internal links?

Seoptimally scans your content and automatically suggests or inserts internal links based on relevant keywords and SEO best practices.

Does the plugin slow down my website?

No, Seoptimally is optimized for performance and runs client-side to minimize any impact on server resources.

Is there a free version of Seoptimally?

Yes, Seoptimally offers a free trial where users can import a small website (up to 50 pages) and perform the internal linking analysis. For larger websites and advanced features, premium plans are available.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Initial release of Seoptimally – Automatic Internal Linking.
